text: Mark Gevorgyan (born 1 June 2005) is a German football player. He plays as defender for the Austrian 2nd league club FC Liefering ==Career == Gevorgyan began his career at TSV 1860 Rosenheim. For the 2017/18 season he moved to Austria to join the FC Red Bull Salzburg youth team. From the 2019/20 season he played for all age groups of the academy at Salzburg. For the 2022/23 season he moved into the squad of the second-class farm team FC Liefering FC Liefering Homepage He made his debut in the 2nd division in September 2022 when he started against SV Horn on matchday seven of that season. ==National team== Gevorgyan made his debut for the Germany U-17 team in November 2021, for which he made five appearances until February 2022. ==References== Category:2005 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Liefering players
title: Mark Gevorgyan
